content:
TITLE: Adding Bluetooth API compatibility in runtime-mini DESCRIPTION: Adds cross-compatibility for Bluetooth methods between Alipay and WeChat. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` 20251dc1d268b84f9ed1724c2bd6c97ae4b55685 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Fixing Component Issues in runtime-mini DESCRIPTION: Fixes issues with observer and created event timing when converting from WeChat to Alipay, and fixes errors when components call batchedUpdates. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` 8dad8706cf88cc62b129e4db3baadfeca33eb607 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Bluetooth conversion methods DESCRIPTION: Adds methods for converting Bluetooth APIs between Alipay and WeChat. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` fd6fcc461bc32ec5cb89cfb3444728c2e6774189 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Documenting Bug Fix in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Documents a bug fix for the runtime-mini package related to image saving API compatibility between Alipay and WeChat. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/runtime-mini/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ### Bug Fixes * **runtime-mini:** 支付宝转微信类场景移除 saveImageToPhotosAlbum => saveImage 转换 ([7a00597](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/commit/7a0059702bd424ecde2abaf0e960bbc8a1d84fe7)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Fixing SJS/WXS File Imports in plugin-compiler DESCRIPTION: Replaces require/import statements in SJS/WXS files with real paths. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` 6b2031ba089a40370872b5cccd2efe1b75abc0de ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Fixing URL Matching in runtime-web DESCRIPTION: Fixes an issue where pages could not be matched due to missing / in the URL. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` ed239313309cd2ab8ae3bae45b4017f92e0ebfa5 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing slot component attribute parsing in web compiler DESCRIPTION: Removes parsing of class and style attributes for slot components and improves node return value validation in the web compiler plugin. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/plugin-compiler/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` **plugin-compiler-web:** 移除 slot 组件对 class, style 属性的解析以及完善节点返回值校验 ([#79](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/issues/79)) ([fcca600](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/commit/fcca60068edc7e50787e5f36eac328b6e48ee4bd)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Fixing getApp export in plugin-compiler DESCRIPTION: Fixes an issue where getApp injection in subpackages and plugins caused issues with CommonJS imports due to export default. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` f47a2c5ed3779daedf055355280b841c2aeee647 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Custom Search Handling in runtime-web DESCRIPTION: Adds support for custom search handling functions to adapt to dynamic parameter scenarios. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` f142e73083a98d6ec26b404ac1c9b31d86b652f0 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding shared context support for template parsing DESCRIPTION: Enhances template file parsing to support shared context propagation at the page level. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/plugin-compiler/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` **plugin-compiler:** template 文件解析增加页面纬度的共享上下文透传支持 ([184a132](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/commit/184a1323bc0840ddbc0a759179467e54f3c82453)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Support for Dynamic Page Configuration in runtime-web DESCRIPTION: Adds support for dynamically changing page configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` e0d8e542b978bc81d1185d73acffdc3aab128057 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Modifying Observer Execution in runtime-mini DESCRIPTION: Changes observer execution to only trigger when data changes compared to default values, instead of executing every time. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` 50c9e0766018c33244d2e5ba748cdba829b8b85e ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Improving WXS file parsing for WeChat DSL to Web conversion DESCRIPTION: Optimizes the support for parsing WXS files when converting WeChat DSL to web. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/plugin-compiler/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` **plugin-compiler:** 优化微信 DSL 转 Web 对 wxs 文件解析逻辑的支持 ([dac0fc5](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/commit/dac0fc5a8991fa2aa7947ba0deecd4c157555d52)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding runtime entry and sourceType check in plugin-compiler DESCRIPTION: Adds automatic detection of runtime entry function and sourceType matching during compilation. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` 1096bad220a1f4807bf657755b18544a241fb39f ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enhancing setEntrySource for in-memory file writing DESCRIPTION: Improves the logic for supporting in-memory file writing when using setEntrySource. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/plugin-compiler/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` **plugin-compiler:** 完善 setEntrySource 对写入内存文件的逻辑支持 ([3bb4a92](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/commit/3bb4a922cbf7a42a3547d85d07c0304b1c6b4368)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Improving temporary file storage in plugin-composer DESCRIPTION: Improves integration temporary file storage logic to avoid cache conflicts in multi-configuration mode. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` cbefb55664c89ea94e8e199aca440a3c885603e2 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Modifying movable-view Component in runtime-web DESCRIPTION: Changes movable-view component to allow vertical scrolling when set to only horizontal scrolling by canceling default behavior prevention. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` 52e9756b4aa5d22d5bae9d57e0191f3f04b51495 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Fixing compose results overwrite in plugin-composer DESCRIPTION: Fixes an issue where compose-results.json files for different configurations were overwriting each other. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` fb91ac761783df647b31e16e66bb299cde1c641c ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Documenting Feature Addition in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Documents a new feature added to the runtime-mini package to support the getTabBar method. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/runtime-mini/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ### Features * **runtime-mini:** 解除 getTabBar 方法的不支持标记 ([d8b9059](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/commit/d8b905983b35ae2480d89c15a6eb469e65a69555)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Exposing generateComposeModuleHash in CLI DESCRIPTION: Exposes the generateComposeModuleHash method to allow customization of integration capabilities. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` 993d66fea7421a5503b810b1032fec0eb1ad7ddd ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding execCommands utility method DESCRIPTION: Adds a general execCommands method for executing scripts and handling errors. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` 36dfc64342f3dff3b240ced7b3f4335c60cd7180 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying MorJS Logo and Badges in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to display the MorJS logo and various badges (NPM version, license, PRs welcome, etc.) using Markdown and HTML syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ```

[![NPM Version][npm-image]][npm-url] [![License][license-image]][license-url] [![PRs Welcome][pr-image]][pr-url] [![CLA assistant][cla-image]][cla-url] [![Discussions][discussions-image]][discussions-url] [discussions-image]: https://img.shields.io/badge/discussions-on%20github-blue [discussions-url]: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/discussions [pr-image]: https://img.shields.io/badge/PRs-welcome-brightgreen.svg [pr-url]: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/pulls [npm-image]: https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@morjs/cli.svg [npm-url]: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@morjs/cli [license-image]: https://img.shields.io/npm/l/@morjs/cli.svg [license-url]: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/LICENSE [cla-image]: https://cla-assistant.io/readme/badge/eleme/mor [cla-url]: https://cla-assistant.io/eleme/mor
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Formatting Feature Entry in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Shows how new features are documented in the changelog, including the affected component and a brief description. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/runtime-web/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ### Features * **plugin-compiler:** 支持 web-pro 编译 ([da23459](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/commit/da23459120a328a20f84c7f2f82a058deedcfd5e)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Formatting Bug Fix Entry in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how bug fixes are documented in the changelog, including the affected component and a brief description. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/runtime-web/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ### Bug Fixes * **runtime-web:** 因行高导致的不居中问题 ([a064097](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/commit/a0640972fd1174080ab89fc269397d6c32d77fb6)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating MorJS Project Template with Variables DESCRIPTION: Basic markdown template that includes placeholder variables for project name and description, using EJS-style template syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/plugin-generator/templates/projects/mor-components-library/wechat/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # <%= name %> <%= desc %> ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Code of Conduct Document DESCRIPTION: Complete markdown document containing the code of conduct rules, standards and enforcement policies for Alibaba open source projects. Adapted from the Contributor Covenant version 1.4. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # Alibaba Open Source Code of Conduct ## Our Pledge In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as contributors and maintainers pledge to making participation in our project and our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation. ## Our Standards Examples of behavior that contributes to creating a positive environment include: - Using welcoming and inclusive language - Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences - Gracefully accepting constructive criticism - Focusing on what is best for the community - Showing empathy towards other community members Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include: - The use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances - Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks - Public or private harassment - Publishing others' private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission - Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting ## Our Responsibilities Project maintainers are responsible for clarifying the standards of acceptable behavior and are expected to take appropriate and fair corrective action in response to any instances of unacceptable behavior. Project maintainers have the right and responsibility to remove, edit, or reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, and other contributions that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct, or to ban temporarily or permanently any contributor for other behaviors that they deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, or harmful. ## Scope This Code of Conduct applies both within project spaces and in public spaces when an individual is representing the project or its community. Examples of representing a project or community include using an official project e-mail address, posting via an official social media account, or acting as an appointed representative at an online or offline event. Representation of a project may be further defined and clarified by project maintainers. ## Enforcement Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting the project team at opensource@alibaba-inc.com. All complaints will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. The project team is obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident. Further details of specific enforcement policies may be posted separately. Project maintainers who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct in good faith may face temporary or permanent repercussions as determined by other members of the project's leadership. ## Attribution This Code of Conduct is adapted from the [Contributor Covenant][homepage], version 1.4, available at ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Inserting Project Description in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to dynamically insert the project description into the Markdown content using a template placeholder. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/plugin-generator/templates/projects/mor-components-library/alipay/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` <%= desc %> ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Project Name in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to dynamically insert the project name into a Markdown header using a template placeholder. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/plugin-generator/templates/projects/mor-components-library/alipay/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # <%= name %> ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: MorJS Plugin Analyzer Version History in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown formatted changelog showing version history from 1.0.0 to 1.0.71 with commit guidelines reference and version comparison links. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/plugin-analyzer/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # Change Log All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. See [Conventional Commits](https://conventionalcommits.org) for commit guidelines. ## [1.0.71](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/compare/v1.0.70...v1.0.71) (2023-07-26) **Note:** Version bump only for package @morjs/plugin-analyzer ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating Version Number in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Updates the version number and date in the changelog header. This is repeated for each version update throughout the file. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/runtime-mini/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ## [1.0.113](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/compare/v1.0.112...v1.0.113) (2024-05-21) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Versioning in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how version numbers are formatted in the changelog, including links to compare different versions on GitHub. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ## [1.0.2](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2) (2023-03-06) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Formatting Version Header in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Shows how version headers are formatted in the changelog, including version number, date, and link to compare with previous version. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/runtime-web/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [1.0.112](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/compare/v1.0.111...v1.0.112) (2024-05-10) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Linking Git Commit in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to link a Git commit hash in Markdown format, used throughout the changelog to reference specific changes. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ([de6935e](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/commit/de6935e03634383283240e4924d610192b506a8f)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Semantic Version Links in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Links to version comparisons between releases using semantic versioning format SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [1.0.113](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/compare/v1.0.112...v1.0.113) (2024-05-21) ## [1.0.112](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/compare/v1.0.111...v1.0.112) (2024-05-10) ## [1.0.111](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/compare/v1.0.110...v1.0.111) (2024-05-06) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Commit References in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Git commit hashes with links and descriptions following conventional commits format SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` - **plugin-compiler-alipay:** 支付宝转微信时 input 事件失效 ([971810c](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/commit/971810cc5fee33025faaa7ba54fcd17f23ecdff5)) - **runtime-mini:** 支付宝转微信类场景移除 saveImageToPhotosAlbum => saveImage 转换 ([7a00597](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/commit/7a0059702bd424ecde2abaf0e960bbc8a1d84fe7)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Version Number Comparison DESCRIPTION: Markdown formatting for version number comparison SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/core/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [1.0.86](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/compare/v1.0.85...v1.0.86) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Git Commit Link DESCRIPTION: Git commit hash reference with link formatting SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/core/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [e0e3c0e](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/commit/e0e3c0e925ab8079614b2fa4defda84cc6fb226f) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Issue Reference Link DESCRIPTION: GitHub issue reference with link formatting SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/core/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [#122](https://github.com/eleme/morjs/issues/122) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Conventional Commits Link in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Provides a link to the Conventional Commits specification for commit message guidelines. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/runtime-web/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` See [Conventional Commits](https://conventionalcommits.org) for commit guidelines. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Version Comparison Link DESCRIPTION: GitHub comparison link showing changes between versions. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/plugin-compiler-taobao/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` https://github.com/eleme/morjs/compare/v1.0.112...v1.0.113 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Conventional Commits Link DESCRIPTION: Reference link to Conventional Commits guidelines for commit message formatting. SOURCE: https://github.com/eleme/morjs/blob/main/packages/plugin-compiler-taobao/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [Conventional Commits](https://conventionalcommits.org) ```
